overview:
Jacquie Phillips is currently co-founder and Head of Product at Lifecrowd.com. She is known as a passionate product evangelist and user advocate.

The former Googler oversees product development and user experience for Lifecrowd’s expanding group activities social platform that makes it easy for users to discover, host, and participate in group activities happening in their area.

Prior to Lifecrowd, Phillips served as business product manager for Google Offers. She was also the lead PM for Google’s first experiment in personalized product search for soft goods, Boutiques.com.

Phillips was the director of product management at Like.com [acquired by Google Inc.] There, she developed several dynamic tools for product category, genre, events classification and an intelligent curation and rating system for brands and merchants. She has a patent pending as Joint Inventor for the Stylyzerâ„¢, a bionic visual quiz Phillips designed to determine a user’s style genre and shopping preferences. Her product work on dynamic image recognition and enhanced search of remote content earned Phillips a Joint Inventor Patent.

A venerated style expert, Phillips has also been a featured fashion and style commentator and served as Managing Editor at SheFinds.com.

external_links.title: Lifecrowd Adds Former Google Offers Product Manager as Co-Founder and Head of Product
